Deolinda Inês Caetano Kinzimba (a mụrụ na 11 Mee 1995) bụ onye na-agụ egwu na onye na-ede egwu na onye Angola.
A mụrụ Kinzimba na Luanda ma too na Ingombota
O kwuru na o nwere obi ụtọ n'oge ọ bụ nwata ma nwee mmasị na egwu site na nwata
Mmetụta ya gụnyere Phyllis Hyman na Selena Quintanilla. Kinzimba biri na Tanzania mgbe ọ dị afọ iri na ụma n'ihi na o nwere nwanne nwanyị na-arụ ọrụ n'ụlọ ọrụ nnọchiteanya Angola
Ọ kwagara Guimarães, Portugal n'afọ 2014 iji mụọ ihe na iji nwee ohere ka mma. Kinzimba gara akwụkwọ iwu na Porto.
N'afọ 2016, ọ meriri oge nke atọ nke The Voice Portugal
A kpọrọ Kinzimba "Whitney Houston ọhụrụ" ka ọ na-abụ abụ Houston "I Have Nothing" nke a na-aja mma
Ọ rụrụ "I Will Always Love You" nke Mariah Carey na "A Moment Like This" nke Kelly Clarkson na njedebe
Kinzimba zutere nne ya, onye ọ na-ahụbeghị kemgbe afọ abụọ. N'ihi mmeri ahụ, Kinzimba bịanyere aka na nkwekọrịta na Universal. N'ọnwa Septemba afọ 2016, ọ pụtara na ihe ngosi "Dentro".

E wepụtara egwu mbụ ya, "Primeira Vez", n'ọnwa Ọktoba afọ 2016. N'ọnwa Nọvemba afọ 2017, ọ wepụtara abọm mbụ ya akpọrọ onwe ya. "Deolinda Kinzimba" natara kpakpando atọ na ọkara site na Sábado, na-eto mmetụta na arụmọrụ Kimzimba ma na-akatọ amụma nke ndekọ ahụ

N'agbanyeghị nke ahụ, magazin ahụ kwuru na ọ bụ ezigbo mmalite na ọtụtụ egwu siri ike. O sonyere na Festival RTP da Canção 2017, na oku nke onye na-ede egwu Rita Redshoes, wee ruo na ngwụcha nke ihe omume ahụ.
